arts.ttl: Inter Milan Must Rely On Turkey Star Against Juventus After Summer Of Drama & Speculation
arts.sum: Inter Milan will look to Hakan Calhanoglu to inspire them to victory over Juventus, after a summer of speculation and chaos surrounding the Turkish midfielder.
